adjectives.description: heavyset (comparative more heavyset, superlative most heavyset)

entries.meaning: (of a person) Having a large, solid, imposing bodily appearance; overweight.
examples: No Soviet political figure has been as irreverently outspoken about Soviet life or as ambitious to change it as Boris Yeltsin, 58, a heavyset, 6-ft. 2-in. man from Sverdlovsk in the Ural Mountains.
